item.title: About
item.description: I do mostly backend engineering. I love python and ZEN of Python. Django, FastApi, Java, Distributed systems, SQL/NoSQL, Docker, etc. Now Lead Backend Engineer @shipup I enjoy learning new things. The queue is at Go, Better System Design!, ML/AI on my list of learning new things.
